infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: We use notifications to remind you to follow up with your leads.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Close With Mario uses your microphone to record voice notes on leads, such as when you want to add spoken updates instead of typing.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Close With Mario uses your contacts only when you choose to save a lead into your device's address book.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Close With Mario uses your photo library only when you choose an image for your profile picture. For example, you may select a headshot so teammates can recognize your account.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Close With Mario uses your camera only when you take a profile picture so your team can recognize your account.
